SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(PRODUCT_PRICE, 'FM999,999,999,999') PRODUCT_PRICE, CATEGORY_NO, PRODUCT_MESSAGE, (SELECT PRODUCT_IMG_ADDRESS FROM PRODUCT_IMG PIMG WHERE PIMG.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO AND PRODUCT_IMG_ORDER = 0) AS THUMBNAIL_IMG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "ORDER_PRODUCT" O WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = O.PRODUCT_NO) RATES FROM PRODUCT P WHERE PRODUCT_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%${keyword}%'
ORDER BY RATES DESC
ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(PRODUCT_PRICE,'999999999999')
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(PRODUCT_PRICE,'999999999999') DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
